repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
The third part of a multi-volume manuscript of the Tirukkuṟaḷ, with the commentary by Parimēlaḻakar, in 3 parts:
part 1 (Aṟattuppāl) = BnF Indien 48.
part 2 (Poruṭpāl) = BnF Indien 49.
part 3 (Kāmattuppāl) = BnF Indien 50.
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (October 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

collation.desc: 1 bifolio = Title Page (additional). Verso blank. 395 x 30 mm
1 folio = guard leaf. Blank recto verso. 395 x 30 mm
66 folios = Tirukkuṟaḷ: Text & Commentary. Tamil foliation 261-326. 395 x 30 mm
1 folio = Tirukkuṟaḷ: Table of Contents. No foliation. 395 x 30 mm
1 bifolio = guard leaf (additional). Blank recto verso. 395 x 25 mm.
the back cover. Photo missing on Gallica

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation despite boreholes and truncations.

handNote.desc: Hand #2. Traditional script with modern ṟa.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 50 (front cover, recto).
BnF donation sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark sticker (Société Asiatique?), written in black ink: 679 (f[1]r).
Left-marginal chapter intertitles. See selection below.
List of chapters (entitled kāmattuppāl; 3 + 1 columns): chapter's name followed by its folio number; total chapters (atikāram), overall total stanzas (kuṟaḷ). See details below.

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year vikkiṟama of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1820-1821, 1760-1761, 1700-1701, etc. See date colophon (U3, f326v, c3, line 3). Dated to circa 1830 by Vinson (1868) and to 1830 by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Tirukkuṟaḷ. 1961. Tiruvaḷḷuva Nāyaṉār tiruvāymalarntaruḷiya Tirukkuraḷ mūlamum paḻaiya uraiyum. Mukavurai: Mu. Varatarācaṉār. Ceṉṉai: U. Vē. Cāminātaiyar Nūl Nilaiyam.

Tirukkuṟaḷ. 1972-1976. Tirukuṟaḷ mūlamum Parimēlaḻakaruraiyum. Edited by Kō. Vaṭivēlu Ceṭṭiyār. iyaṟṟiya teḷiporuḷ viḷakkamum, karutturaiyum, kuṟippuraiyum. āṅkila moḻipeyarppuṭaṉ Tiruvaḷḷuvamālai. 3 vols.: mutal pakuti aṟattuppāl; iraṇṭām pakuti poruṭpāl; mūṉṟām pakuti kāmattuppāl. Maturai: Maturaip Palkalaik Kaḻakam.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 11, nos. 48-50.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 17r, nos. 48-50.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 17, nos. 48-50. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Encoded, revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS.
Updated by Emmanuel FRANCIS after examination of the original manuscript. Version 2, October 2022.

body.ab:
veṟṟivē
l uṟṟa tuṇai
kāmattuppāl
takaiyaṇaṅkuṟuttal
Iṉi yapporuḷait tuṇaikkāraṇamāka vuṭaittā yimmaiyē payappatāya viṉpaṅ kūṟuvā ṉeṭuttuk koṇṭā rīṇṭiṉ
pameṉṟa torukālat toruporuḷā ṉaimpulaṉu nukartaṟ ciṟappuṭaittāya kāma viṉpattiṉai yicciṟappuppaṟṟi vaṭa
nūluṭ pōcarācaruñ cuvaipalaveṉṟuṅ kūṟuvār kūṟuka yāṅ kūṟuva tiṉpaccuvai yoṉṟaṉaiyumēyeṉa vitaṉai
mikuttuk kūṟiṉār Itu puṇarcci piriveṉa viruvakaippaṭum Ēṉai Irutta liraṅka lūleṉpavōveṉi ṉivar poruṭ
pākupāṭṭiṉai yaṟamporuḷiṉpameṉa vaṭanūlār vaḻakkuppaṟṟi yōtutalā ṉavvāṟēyavaṟṟaip piriviṉka ṇaṭakkiṉā
reṉka Iṉi yavaitammaiyē tamiḻnūlkaḷōṭum poruntap puṇarcciyaik kaḷaveṉṟum pirivaik kaṟpeṉṟum perum
pāṉmaipaṟṟi vakut tavaṟṟaic cuvaimikutipayappa vulakanaṭaiyō ṭoppumovvāmaiyu muṭaiyavākak kūṟukiṉṟār Ak
kaikōḷiraṇṭiṉuḷḷuṅ kaḷavāvatu piṇi muppiṟappukkaḷiṉṟi yeññāṉṟu morutaṉmaiyarā yuruvun tiruvum paruvamuṅ kulaṉuṅ
kuṇamu maṉpumutaliyavaṟṟāṟ ṟammuḷoppumaiyuṭaiyarāya talaimakaṉun talaimakaḷum piṟarkoṭuppavu maṭuppavumiṉṟip pālvakaiyāṟ
ṟāmē yetirppaṭṭup puṇarntu varuvatu Ataṉai yēḻati kārattāṟ kūṟuvāṉṟoṭaṅki mutaṟkaṭ ṭakaiyaṇaṅkuṟuttal kūṟukiṉṟā raḵtā
vatu poḻilviḷaiyāṭṭu viruppaṉāya nīṅka vataṉkaṭṭamiyaḷāy niṉṟāḷai vēṭṭaiviruppā ṉiḷaiyār nīṅkat tamiyaṉāy vantu kaṇṇu
ṟṟa talaimaka ṉavaḷ vaṉapput taṉṉai varutamuṟavittalaic collutal Itu kaṇṇuṟṟa poḻutē nikaḻvatākaliṉ mutaṟkaṭ kūṟappaṭṭatu
Aṇaṅkuko lāymayil kollō kaṉaṅkuḻai
mātarkoṉ mālumeṉ ṉeñcu = Etu = talaimakaḷuruvumutaliya muṉkaṇṭaṟivaṉavaṉṟic ciṟanta
maiyi ṉavaḷait talaimaka ṉaiyuṟṟatu yikkaṉaviya kuḻaiyai yuṭaiyā ḷippoḻiṟka ṇuṟaivāḷōr teyva makaḷō vaṉṟiyē yorarumayil vicēṭamō vaṉṟi
yē yoru māṉuṭamātarō ivaḷai yiṉṉaḷeṉṟu tuṇiyamāṭṭā teṉṉeñcu mayaṅkāniṉṟateṉṟavāṟu ~ Āymayila paṭaittōṉ vicēṭamāka vāyntu
paṭaitta mayil mayiṟcātiyuṭ ṭerinteṭutta mayileṉṟumām kaṉaṅkuḻai yākupeyar kaṇaṅkuḻaiyeṉṟu pāṭamōtip palavāyt tiraṇṭakuḻaiyeṉ ṟu
raippārumuḷar yeḻutalākāvuruvun taṉvaruttamumpaṟṟi yaṇaṅkuko leṉṟum cāyalum poḻilvayi ṉiṟṟalumpaṟṟi yāyamayilkollō ve
ṟun taṉṉeñcañ ceṉṟamaiyu mavaḷetir nōkkiyavāṟumpaṟṟi mātarkoleṉṟuṅ kūṟiṉāṉ = 1 =
Ūṭutal kāmattiṟ kiṉpa mataṟkiṉpaṅ
kūṭi muyaṅkap peṟiṉ = Etu ~ Ituvumatu ~ kāmanukarccik kiṉpamāva tataṉai nukartaṟkuriyarāvā rārā
maipaṟṟit tammuḷūṭuta lavvūṭutaṟ kiṉpamāva tataṉai yaḷavamaritu nīṅkit tammuṭ kūṭi muyaṅkutalmāyiṉam muyakkameṉṟavāṟu ~
kūṭuta lottavaḷavuṇaviṉarātal mutirntu tuṉiyāyavaḻit tuṉpam payattalāṉu mutirāta pulaviyāyavaḻik kalaviyiṉpam payavāmaiyāṉu
miraṇṭiṟkumiṭaiyākiya vaḷavaṟintu nīṅkutalariteṉpatupaṟṟik kūṭimuyaṅkappeṟi ṉeṉṟāṉ Avviraṇṭiṉpamum
yāṉ peṟṟē ṉeṉpatām Īṇṭip piriviṉai vaṭanūṉmatampaṟṟic celavāṟṟāmai vituppup pulavi yeṉa nālvakaittākkik kūṟiṉā ravaṟṟuṭ
celavu pirivāṟṟāmai yuḷḷum Āṟṟāmai paṭarmeliraṅkaṉ muta ṉiṟaiyaḻita vīṟāyavaṟṟuḷḷum vitup pavarvayiṉ vitumpaṉmutal puṇarcci
vitumpa līṟāyavaṟṟuḷḷum pulavi neñcoṭu pulattaṉ mutalūṭaluvakaiyīṟāyavaṟṟuḷḷuṅ kaṇṭu koḷaka Aḵtēl vaṭanūlā rivaṟṟuṭaṉē
cāpattiṉāṉāya nīkkattiṉaiyuṅ kūṭṭip piriviṉai yaivakaitteṉṟārā leṉi ṉaḵtaṟamporuḷiṉpameṉṉum payaṉkaḷu ḷoṉṟupaṟṟi
ya pirivaṉmaiyāṉu muṉivarāṇaiyā ṉorukālat tōrkuṟṟattuḷatāvatalla tulakiyalpāy vārāmaiyāṉu mīṇṭoḻikkappaṭṭa teṉ
patām = 10 = 1330 = kāmattuppāṉ muṭintatu = Ara = 380 – poru 700 – kāma = 250 {Āka} pāl 3k=ku tirukkuṟaḷ ceyyuḷ ~ 1330
tiruvaḷḷuvappayaṉ muppāliṟkum āciriyar parimēlaḻakar virutti muṟṟum
veṇpā
tiruttaku teyvat tiruvaḷḷu varataṅ
karuttamai vellāṅ karuti viritturaittāṉ
paṉṉu tamiḻtēr paramēlaḻaka ṉeṉṉu
maṉṉu muyarnāmaṉ vantu =
kuṉṟi ṉeñcupaka veṟinta ceñcuṭar
neṭuvēlōṉ kākka
vikkiṟama varuṣam Āvaṇi mācam 15 tēti
